<p><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_ndlotnjXG71rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/b92ba3aacc0f75e8f0a51623f1fa8807/tumblr_inline_ndlox7n5ko1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>This is <strong><span class="author may-blank id-t2_6qtd5">Cyrax002</span></strong>'s Halloween costume. It's currently in alpha, but will be hitting beta shortly before it's time to nab some candy. What else does he need?</p>

Altering the flags to KSP flags and making the head slightly wider, perhaps? Just suggestions. I know human and kerbal statures aren't exactly cross-compatible...

Edit: First

Edited October 21, 2014 by KarmaLarma

A helmet and larger head. (Moar rounder)

Perhaps an EVA jetpack?
A bar that says his Stupidity, Braveness and if he is BadS...
Well, it kinda needs a fish bowl over his head
Don't forget that the eyes are different sizes.

Great job. The suit and face will say to everyone who doesnt know about KSP, " oh, look its a qute green alien".

Others, familiar with KSP will see you as a Kerbal.

Now, if only there was a scary KRAKEN lurking around.

Instead of Trick or Treat. Use sound clips from Chatterer.

Edited October 18, 2014 by MoeslyArmlis
All hallows' eve is great.
have a sign saying "candy or bust" worked for me.....
An EVA jetpack to store all the candy!
OMG I can't stop laughing. That expression!

This is Cyrax002's Halloween costume. It's currently in alpha, but will be hitting beta shortly before it's time to nab some candy. What else does he need?

I can't believe nobody else has said this but... what does he need?

MOAR BOOSTERS!!!
